feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a romantic color theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and centers the ValentineExperience component in a full-screen layout.
Button component that repositions itself on interaction to avoid being clicked.
frontend/src/components/ValentineExperie: Main Valentine flow managing Yes/No prompt and success state with themed UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and updates a backend actor based on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and hooks for authentication, identity loading, and login handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus custom OKLCH romantic theme variables, light/dark modes, global styles, and utility animations and color classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, romantic color palette, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and state for the romantic Valentine interactive page.
